          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_2f62cdcf0c320b0710fd00b3be50350d0549f404</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Shape and volume of gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Form und Datenträger Gase</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forme et volume de gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forma e volume dos gáses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Figura e volume dei gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μορφή και ένταση του ήχου των αερίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dimensión de una variable y volumen de gases</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that gas does not have its own shape.  It takes on the shape of its container and spreads throughout all the space inside.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shape</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">material properties</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Gas nicht seine 
eigene Form hat. Sie nimmt auf der Form seines Behälters und 
verbreitet während des ganzes Platzes nach innen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que le gaz n'a pas sa 
propre forme. Elle prend la forme de son récipient et écarte 
dans tout tout l'espace à l'intérieur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o gás não tem sua 
própria forma. Faz exame na forma de seu recipiente e espalha 
durante todo todo o espaço para dentro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il gas non ha 
relativa propria figura. Intraprende la figura del relativo 
contenitore e si sparge durante tutto lo spazio all'interno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει που αέριο δεν έχει τη 
μορφή της. Παίρνει τη μορφή του εμπορευματοκιβωτίου του και 
διαδίδει σε όλο το διάστημα μέσα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el gas no tiene su 
propia dimensión de una variable. Adquiere la dimensión de una
variable de su envase y se separa a través de todo el espacio 
adentro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Form</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Datenträger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">materielle Eigenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stoff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">forme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">propriétés matérielles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
